{"id":"chatcmpl-614","object":"chat.completion","created":1767569180,"model":"gpt-oss:120b-cloud","system_fingerprint":"fp_ollama","choices":[{"index":0,"message":{"role":"assistant","content":"","reasoning":"The user wants to: create character catalog, find character "Знайка", update its description to "Главный из коротышек" via upsert_character, using characterId from catalog. Then return JSON catalog.

We need to generate character roster first. Use character_roster_generate_character_roster (fast). Then get roster via character_roster_get_character_roster. Find entry with name "Знайка". Get its characterId and firstPointer. Then call character_roster_upsert_character with new description, same name? The request: update description. Provide aliases, characterId, description, firstPointer, gender maybe unknown. Need to supply required fields: aliases, characterId, description, firstPointer, name, gender (default unknown). Use existing data.

After upsert, get roster again to return JSON.

Let's perform steps.
